Class VanillaSocketChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.openhft.chronicle.core.io.AbstractCloseable
      • net.openhft.chronicle.network.tcp.VanillaSocketChannel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, net.openhft.chronicle.core.io.CloseableTracer, net.openhft.chronicle.core.io.ManagedCloseable, net.openhft.chronicle.core.io.QueryCloseable, net.openhft.chronicle.core.io.ReferenceOwner, ChronicleSocketChannel
